actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify that any amount allowable as a child tax credit under section 24 or an earned income credit under section 32 shall not be treated as income for purposes of any means-tested Federal program.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to prohibit any amount allowed as either a child tax credit or an earned income credit from being treated as income for purposes of determining eligibility for federally-funded assistance programs.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify that any amount allowable as a child tax credit under section 24 or an earned income credit under section 32 shall not be treated as income for purposes of any means-tested Federal program.
